tools:
Filters all proteins that are predicted to reside in lysosomes.
Filter1

GO:0005887 "integral component of plasma membrane"
get_subontology_from

Filters all proteins that are predicted to reside extracellularly.
Filter1

Removes comment lines at the head of the Uniprot Go database file.
Grep1

GO:0005887 "integral component of plasma membrane"
term_id_vs_term_name

filters out all proteins in the input protein list of interest that are annotated as "extracellular region" and "lysosome" and "plasma membrane" excluding "extracellular organelle" and "cytoplasmic side of plasma membrane"
comp1

Extracts uniprot accessions from all proteins in the input list that are predicted by WolfPsort to be lysosomal and/or extracellular.
